meanings.definition: The quality or state of being runty.
meanings.sent1: The runtiness of the puppy made it stand out from its siblings.
meanings.sent2: Her runtiness was evident when she stood next to her tall friends.
meanings.sent3: The runtiness of the tiny kitten made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Despite his runtiness, the little bird soared high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The runtiness of the flower made it even more charming.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being small or undersized, especially in comparison to others of the same kind.
meanings.sent1: The runtiness of the apple made it the perfect snack size.
meanings.sent2: The runtiness of the car allowed it to squeeze into tight parking spots.
meanings.sent3: The runtiness of the squirrel made it the cutest in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her runtiness in the basketball team didn't stop her from scoring points.
meanings.sent5: The runtiness of the mouse made it nimble and quick.
